name: Crappy Bird (Dan Donnan)
description:
Somehow, Bird Game has returned.

Swoop, Scoop and Poop to score points. Complete objectives to increase the number of points scored.

But watch out for the Drones.

Crappy Bird is an enhanced version of Bird Game which was previously developed in under a week. As well as adding support for multiple screen resolutions and instructions on how to play inside the game, changes to the mechanics have been introduced to tie them together.
